ygData.subject: language
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there anybody on Veeshan that has the time to train me on languages?  I d be willing to pay...although I am by no means rich. :P Other then that, we can
ygData.messageBody:
Is there anybody on Veeshan that has the time to train me on languages? I'd
be willing to pay...although I am by no means rich. :P
Other then that, we can trade languages if I have something you don't.

By the way, what are some of the required "magic" languages anyway? It's
not only Old Erudian is it? I've only got Elvish and Gnome up to Excellent.
Some of the others I only have average. Funny how I picked up gnoll,
orcish, and others somewhere along the way. :)

Glad the twinky thread is over ;)
-- Lim'Dul
17th Wiz Veeshan
